title: Beyond barrels: India and Russia build a new energy playbook

content: As India prepares to host Russian President Vladimir Putin on December 4-5 for the 23rd annual India-Russia Summit, the discourse is moving beyond old practices in the energy industry. Rising demand … [+7210 chars]
